title.narrative: Sierra Leone - REVITALIZING EDUCATION DEVELOPMENT IN SIERRA LEONE

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve the learning environment in targeted schools and establish systems for monitoringof education interventions and outcomes. To do this, the Project will finance elements of the ESP that deliver intermediate resultswhile simultaneously addressing critical issues in the system to build the foundation for better management and efficiency withinthe sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section I (f) | Description :The recipient shall engage, before the end of each calendar year,consultants to conduct third party validation (sample-based) of the implementation of Performance-Based School Grants by EligibleSchools under Part 1(a)(i) of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section II (A.4) | Description :No later than 14 months after project effectiveness, acomprehensive MTR of the Project (in conjunction with all agencies involved) during which it shall exchange views with the WorldBank and implementing agencies generally on the performance of the Project, the performance of the Recipient of its obligationsunder the FA, and the performance by said implementing agencies | Due Date :15-Nov-2018

Finance Agreement :Updating procurement record keeping and filing system | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than three(3) months after the Effective Date, update the procurement filing and record keeping system within MEST, in form and substanceacceptable to the World Bank. | Due Date :30-Dec-2014
